name: Minigame Mania (0HarveyH0)
description: Minigame Mania is a 4-player minigame collection in which you and 3 others can play a selection from the hit game "Red Light Green Light" to a coin collection game that rewards the bold as you can collect coins and either lose points or gain them. The game features original characters called "minions". The minions are working for their overlord and have to test new minigames for the overlord's televised game show. Those who lose meet their fate and will be replaced by the ever-expanding roster of minions.
